pageSubtitle: Simplify your links, amplify your reach

urlShortening.title: URL Shortening
urlShortening.description: Quickly turn long URLs into short, manageable links, making them easier to share and remember.

redirection.title: Redirection
redirection.description: Automatically redirect users from your short links to the original, long URL with a single click.

linkPreview.title: Link Preview
linkPreview.description: Allow users to preview the destination of a short link before clicking, improving trust and transparency.

customAliases.title: Custom Aliases
customAliases.description: Create custom aliases for your short links, making them more memorable and brand-friendly.

qrCodeGeneration.title: QR Code Generation
qrCodeGeneration.description: Generate QR codes for your short links, making it easier for users to access them on mobile devices.

clickTracking.title: Click Tracking
clickTracking.description: Monitor how many times your short link has been clicked, helping you track its popularity.
